text: Gu zumgum wom garav, gu Heven gari, thɨma mbe fhogap ki. Gu mba fhum mbararagim, khɨrɨv nan kamgi guma, gu ana kamthooŋ mbararagim, ana mbarɨva fara muuŋgiap nan kamgi. Gu wom ana kamthooŋ mbararagim, ana ntige khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu khaŋ zɨv naaŋrim, gu mba zumgum hɨrga bigi, gu za ntan ndu khɨvarga.”
